Functions
00310_GP_Kinibi_Task_Limits
Limitations

Involved Components and their required Functionality More...

Functions

 TestCase_GC00005_max_tasks ()
 

Detailed Description

Involved Components and their required Functionality

  1. ClientLib
    1. Can connect to daemon
    2. Can reserve memory for connection
  2. McDriverDaemon
    1. Daemon running
    2. Daemon socket accessible by TLC
    3. mcOpenDevice()
  3. Trusted Application from TATestWorkspaceXRAM:
    1. 4 + 8 TAs copied to Android test device in mcRegistry as:
      • 12kB 1 | fe7cf500b5c65edbb1bdab6dcba5f0d7.tabin
      • 12kB 2 | 27d9038f3bea5c65aae9443021a1fd92.tabin
      • 12kB 3 | c8e116f308de558ebe2d1220fb9cd394.tabin
      • 12kB 4 | a841fb02ce325a838a3a41005aa2d169.tabin
    • Each TA has the same code. They differs only by the special header, which is generated individually for each TA. This header contains arrays which increases the size of its code and/or data section.

Meaning of this test group
We check the maximum number of tasks (sessions), which can exist opened at the same time according to the version of Kinibi. For this check we use 4 small TAs (up to Kinibi v400A) or a single small TA (from Kinibi v410). Number of TAs may vary due to the limited number of sessions allowed per TA for older Kinibi versions.

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC00005_max_tasks ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Pre Conditions:
setup() initializes the context
Focus:
Open as many as possible GP TA sessions (instances). Each session will create a new task in the Kinibi. This way we check the max allowed number of tasks.
Test Steps:
Since the number of sessions per TA is limited, we switch from TA to TA if cannot open more sessions for the same TA. After opening all the sessions, they are checked to be alive (able to communicate).
Verification:
InvokeCommand has to return specified error code
Post Conditions:
teardown() closes session and finalizes the context
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
Yes
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
300
Test ID:
Limitations.00310_GP_Kinibi_Task_Limits.GC00005_max_tasks
